WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed, Master of Anatomy was only being exported as +32 crit instead of +40 crit.
WorkItem.Description:
Importing my character from armory I have notice some discrepancy from stats in game and reported from Rawr. 
I understand the fact that stats are affected by possibile trinket procs (is it possible to turn off this feature?).
Exporting my character to enh sim the stats are still wrong (my char:   kalman@aggramar  EU)
                 Game     Rawr     Enhsim
AP:             4989      6261      4959
Agility:        1241      1368      1240
MeleeCrit:  42.44%   43.09%  41.56%
SpellCrit:    30.93%   30.05%  30.05%

Comments.Message: Fixed issues with base stats. Still investigating crit issue. Please note armoury issue will have meant that you may have items - typically T9 head piece that has no socket bonus in Rawr. Use the Edit item feature to correct this issue, as it is not a EnhSim export issue but an item issue.

http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=IDontUnderstandWhy&referringTitle=Documentation
1. "is it possible to turn off this feature?"
- No, only a couple of models support this, though we might start looking into setups to change the view stance in Rawr3 to: Basic (Unprocced), Normal (Avg Procs), Fully Procced
2. Your AP and Agility both look correct for the procs I can see on your character



** Closed by Jothay 12/14/2009 10:07 AM
Crit is indeed wrong. Re-opening issue.
